patthana13.1:2.1_0: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusale khandhe paṭicca
patthana13.1:2.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusalaṁ
patthana13.1:2.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:2.1_3: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo
patthana13.1:2.1_4: khandhā …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana13.1:2.1_5: hetupaccayā— kusalaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe… kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana13.1:2.1_6: nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—kusale khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ.
patthana13.1:3.1_0: Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusale khandhe paṭicca
patthana13.1:3.1_1: cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—akusalaṁ
patthana13.1:3.1_2: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:3.1_3: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:3.1_4: ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:3.1_5: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:4.1_0: Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— vipākābyākataṁ kiriyābyākataṁ
patthana13.1:4.1_1: ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe… paṭisandhikkhaṇe
patthana13.1:4.1_2: …pe… ekaṁ mahābhūtaṁ paṭicca tayo mahābhūtā …pe… dve mahābhūte paṭicca dve mahābhūtā,
patthana13.1:4.1_3: mahābhūte paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo
patthana13.1:4.1_5: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—vipākābyākataṁ
patthana13.1:5.1_0: Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— kusale
patthana13.1:5.1_1: khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ rūpaṁ. Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:5.1_2: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana13.1:5.1_3: nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:6.1_0: Akusalañca abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalañca
patthana13.1:6.1_1: abyākatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalañca abyākatañca
patthana13.1:6.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva
patthana13.1:7.1_0: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:7.1_1: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
patthana13.1:7.1_2: ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:8.1_0: Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:8.1_1: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:8.1_2: ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:9.1_0: Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:9.1_1: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:9.1_2: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti ārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.1:10.1: Hetuyā ekūnavīsa, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā ekūnavīsa, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte ekūnavīsa …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa.
patthana13.1:11.1_0: Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:11.1_1: paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:11.1_2: ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:12.1_0: Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:12.1_1: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:12.1_2: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti nahetupaccayā.
patthana13.1:13.1_0: Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:13.1_1: paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. Kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:13.1_2: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana13.1:14.1_0: Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana13.1:14.1_1: paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā. Akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo
patthana13.1:14.1_2: ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti naārammaṇapaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.1:15.1: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe pannarasa, naadhipatiyā ekūnavīsa …pe… nakamme nava …pe… naāhāre …pe… namagge tīṇi …pe… novigate pannarasa.
patthana13.1:16.1_1: hetuyā chabbīsa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa …pe… avigate chabbīsa. Nissayavārampi saṁsaṭṭhavārampi
patthana13.1:17.1_0: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo naakusalassa
patthana13.1:17.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Kusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana13.1:17.1_2: paccayo. Kusalo dhammo naakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:17.1_3: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:18.1_0: Akusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa
patthana13.1:18.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Akusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa hetupaccayena
patthana13.1:18.1_2: paccayo. Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:18.1_3: Akusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana13.1:19.1_0: Abyākato dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Abyākato dhammo naakusalassa
patthana13.1:19.1_1: dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo. Abyākato dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa
patthana13.1:20.1: Kusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …. (Cha pañhā.)
patthana13.1:21.1: Akusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …. (Cha pañhā.)
patthana13.1:22.1: Abyākato dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …. (Cha pañhā, saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.1:23.1_0: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare soḷasa, samanantare
patthana13.1:23.1_1: soḷasa, sahajāte ekūnavīsa, aññamaññe nava, nissaye chabbīsa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa,
patthana13.1:23.1_2: purejāte cha, pacchājāte nava, āsevane nava, kamme terasa, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre terasa
patthana13.1:23.1_3: …pe… magge terasa, sampayutte nava, vippayutte dvādasa …pe… avigate chabbīsa. (Pañhāvāraṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
